Player History
Drafted in 32nd round, 501st overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,080,000 through salary arbitration...
Released by Montreal on 2/24/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 5/26/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $552,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 6/2/2017, off Andrew Hutzler (NY)...
Earned first career win on 6/2/2017...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $552,000 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by St. Louis (C) on 2/3/2018.
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Cincinnati on 4/6/2018 (Going to CIN: P Nathan Hernandez, 2B Bill Scott. Going to STL: P Christopher Engstrom)...
Released by Cincinnati on 4/16/2018...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/18/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/1/2020 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 4/16/2021 to a minor league deal...
9/11/2021: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $3,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
